benchmark_details.name: COBIAS (Context-Oriented Bias Indicator and Assessment Score)
benchmark_details.overview: COBIAS evaluates model robustness to biased statements by considering various contexts, aiming to improve bias benchmarks for language models.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To assess the contextual reliability of bias benchmarks and improve their quality.

data.source: Augmented dataset created from CrowS-Pairs and StereoSet with contextual annotations.
data.annotation: Human verified with a majority vote of three annotators for context-addition points.

methodology.calculation: COBIAS is calculated by averaging the context-variance scores of statements.
methodology.interpretation: A higher COBIAS score indicates better contextual reliability.
